text: Philip Brian Scott (born August 4, 1958) is an American politician. He is the 82nd and current Governor of Vermont since January 5, 2017. Before being Governor, he was the Lieutenant Governor of Vermont from 2011 to 2017. A Republican, he won the 2016 general election with over 52% of the vote. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Vermont Category:Businesspeople from Vermont Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lieutenant Governors of Vermont
title: Phil Scott
